name: Monika Centrum Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there only for one night in 2011 february and we realy anjoyed our stay. Room was big with beautifull small balcony, it was really cold outside (when outside was about -17 C day time), but room was very warm and cozy. Also we had dinner in the hotel restaurant and it was really good.
reviews.title: Good hotel in excelent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Disapointments - reception (guy on check in english was very poor) and we asked for double room, but got twin
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.text: Service was excellent, professional and very friendly. Room (204) was clean, spacious and comfortable. Did not liked fitted carpet. Buffet breakfast was very good, everything you needed.
reviews.title: Stylish and warm

reviews.text: Nice area around hotel, 1-3 minutes walk to park (childen playground), crocery store, bank (ATM across the street), few restaurants and laundry etc. By walking also 20 minutes to old town and 20 minutes to Riga Arena.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel!

reviews.text: Ideal good location in order to visit Arena - just 15 minutes walk. We booked one month before and got very good price.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are quiet, very clean. Huge bathroom. Good breakfast - different kind of cheese and ham, eggs, even smoked salmon. Very best part was newly baked warm bread and pastries...
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only drawback was "gym" - is is small claustrofobic room with 3 excercise machines. I used one for a while and then returned to my room in order to make some stretching excercising at room carpet. "Gym" is actually the entrance room of sauna, there is no possibilities to lay down because a) there was no room even for a tiny lady and b) floor is extremely cold anyway - floor is covered by ceramic...
reviews.title: Decent Hotel

reviews.text: But otherwise I really liked this hotel and recommend it.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed in this hotel few months ago and we had a very nice stay!
reviews.title: Could be better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well we ve got a discount voucher for one night in this hotel. We were not expecting anything super big. For some reason we got upgraded to a suite and when we entered the room we were just amazed. It was wonderful, clean, fresh, had a bath, and really comfortable bed which we didnt want to leave. We also had late dinner included in our offer, and it also was really nice. The restaurant is really cozy. The 3-course meal was quite fine, nothing exclusive, but served well and tasted good.
reviews.title: overall - incredible experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I definitely recommend this place for travelers looking for quiet place where everything is close. It is on this street where are different embassies. The most beautiful park of Riga is just across the road, tram stop and ferry terminal is on walking distance.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel

reviews.text: We had our honeymoon there. Hotel looks nice in a good location. Just small walk to old town.
reviews.title: A haven from a cold, unfriendly city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was Junior Suite with balcony and facing to the street and park. When I was on the balcony drinking champagne with my wife we felt like stars. :)
reviews.title: Not so good

reviews.text: But the room was really big with big bed and soft red carpet. It was clean and quiet. I suggest it!
reviews.title: Good hotel but not in the center!

reviews.text: Located very close to the centre of Riga - both city centre and Old Riga can be reached in few minutes walk. Hotel staff is always ready to help you. Stayed in various room types - all are comfortable, clean and spacious enough. Hotel is located on the corner of two streets with busy traffic, but it doesn't disturb since this is historical building with good soundproofing. Try it and you won't regret!
reviews.title: One of the best in Riga

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a nice hotel with comfortable rooms and the most kind reception staff you could ever wish for. We stayed for two nights in the end of october. We had a non-smoking room with balcony. The bed was a twin bed but they kindly put one large extra mattress to cover the whole bed and like that making it a double bed as wished for. So nice :)
reviews.title: Great value and great location

reviews.text: I felt a bit cold in the room at first but after meantioned it to the reception, we got an extra heater to keep us warm during sligtly cold weather, and it did.
reviews.title: No ones perfect :)
Excelent hotel
reviews.text: Location is great, just a 10-15 minutes walk to the old town of Riga. Breakfast was good and I do not agree with some reviews that said that there is not enough choice of food. There is.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Extra appreciation for the FREE early check-in and late check-out we got. Unbelievable nice!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

description: The spirit of hospitality and elegancy lingers in hotel MONIKA CENTRUM HOTELS which opened its doors on December 19th, 2005. Here, you will always feel at home. Situated in a prestigious district in the centre of Riga, the luxurious hotel MONIKA CENTRUM HOTELS offers excellent service and royal treatment to all guests. Riga – the 800 years old Hanseatic city situated on the banks of the Daugava River and is named the Baltic pearl. The city harmoniously merges history and modern life style. It is a great decision to choose hotel MONIKA CENTRUM HOTELS as your residence in Riga! Without any doubt you will appreciate its really advantageous location: opposite to the Kronvalda Park in the Quiet centre, near the embassy quarter, a few steps from the Congress Hall and the International Business Centre. Only 10 minutes walk and you find yourself in the narrow streets of the medieval Old Town with an air of history or in the famous Art Noveau quarter with its outstanding masterpieces of architecture in the city centre.
